meaning: The knowledge (scripture) of Mantras (Mantra shastra) is known as महा-विद्या। (Mahā-vidyā.) Such knowledge is also Her form.
commentary:
The spiritual austerities undertaken to reach Goddess Vana-durga is also known as महा-विद्या (Mahā-vidyā) upasana.

The collection of the 10 major branches of knowledge (Dasha vidyas) is known as महा-विद्या। (Mahā-vidyā.) This महा-विद्या (Mahā-vidyā) contains 700 mantras.
